page.title: 11The Community,Bromley,S.E
page.content: People feel generally that this is a suitable place to raise children and live a safe and comfortable life. The main concerns of the Green Street Green Association are environmental problems, such as cleanliness of streets and development/planning permission. Vandalism is a major problem for local farms and sports clubs.There are Â£Neighbourhood Watch' schemes in the area, and this community approach to crime prevention was felt to be of great value. Most people are happy with their local shops, and are against Sunday opening on religious grounds. Children like the area because they are near to open spaces and woodland where they can play, but teenagers find little to do. The nearest discos, theatres and cinemas are in Bromley.
